Description: Gilded bronze bracelet with snake terminals.
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (2774)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: Cleopatra: The Magic of Egypt at Chiostro del Bramante, Rome from 12 October 2013 to 2 February 2014
